Package org.alicebot.ab

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AIMLProcessorExtension
    The interface needed to implement AIML Extension A class implementing AIMLProcessorExtension should return a Set of tag names and provide a function to recursively evaluate the XML parse tree for each node associated with a new tag.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AB  
    AIMLMap
    implements AIML Map A map is a function from one string set to another.
    AIMLProcessor
    The core AIML parser and interpreter.
    AIMLSet
    implements AIML Sets
    AIMLWriter
    Helper class to write some custom AIML
    Bot
    Class representing the AIML bot
    Category
    structure representing an AIML category and operations on Category
    Chat
    Class encapsulating a chat session between a bot and a client
    Contact
    This class is here to simulate a Contacts database for the purpose of testing contactaction.aiml
    Graphmaster
    The AIML Pattern matching algorithm and data structure.
    History<T>
    History object to maintain history of input, that request and response
    Interval  
    JapaneseTokenizer
    Tokenize a Japanese language input by inserting spaces between words see http://atilika.org/
    MagicBooleans
    Global boolean values that control various actions in Program AB
    MagicNumbers
    Integers with specific values in Program AB
    MagicStrings
    Global values for many strings in Program AB
    MemStats
    Memory statistics for program instrumentation
    Nodemapper
    Nodemapper data structure.
    NodemapperOperator  
    ParseState
    ParseState is a helper class for AIMLProcessor
    Path
    Linked list representation of Pattern Path and Input Path
    PCAIMLProcessorExtension
    This is just a stub to make the contactaction.aiml file work on a PC with some extension tags that are defined for mobile devices.
    Predicates
    Manage client predicates
    PreProcessor
    AIML Preprocessor and substitutions
    Properties
    Bot Properties
    Sraix  
    StarBindings
    structure to hold binding of wildcards in input pattern, that pattern and topicpattern
    Stars
    Array of values matching wildcards
    Timer
    Specialized timer function for program instrumentation
    Utilities
